Source.Name: libcloudproviders
Source.Summary: libcloudproviders is a DBus API that allows cloud storage sync clients to expose their services.
Source.Description: libcloudproviders is a DBus API that allows cloud storage sync clients to expose their services. Clients such as file managers and desktop environments can then provide integrated access to the cloud providers services.
